lead_paragraph: TAKESIAN--John A.,82, died March 7, New York City Fashion Guru, Best Dressed Guy, Wit Animal Lover, Beloved Friend, Lover, and, above all, Sui Generis, Man. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  TAKESIAN, JOHN A.
